review.title: “not happy”
review.pros: Pros – The people are great. It is like a small family, but the place is very small and family owned so there is no real organization.
review.cons: Cons – There are no benefits but insurance and insurance is very expensive because they have downsized so much that the gropup insurance has sky rocketed.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The best advice is for management to set professional guide lines that are actually followed and not changed every other week.
